wikipedia_page.main: Sidney Louis Walter Merlin (Greek: Σίδνεϋ Μέρλιν, April 26, 1856 – 1952) was a British botanist and sports shooter. He competed at the 1896 Summer Olympics and the 1906 Intercalated Games in Athens.
